register.description: This register controls the release of the ALWAYS ON Domain resets.

bitenum.description: Reset is asserted for the Wakeup Processor by the A9
Reset is cleared for the Wakeup Processor

register.description: This register logs the different reset sources of the ALWON domain. Each bit is set upon release of the domain reset signal. Must be cleared by software. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Wakeup Processor has been reset due to Wakeup Processor ICECRUSHER1 reset event
Wakeup Processor has been reset due to emulation reset source e.g. [[br]]assert reset command initiated by the icepick module

register.description: This register contains dedicated DEBUGSS module context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if memory-based context in DEBUGSS_MEM memory bank has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source.
Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. [[br]](set upon assertion of EMU_RST signal)

register.description: This register contains dedicated ADC0 module context statuses.

bitfield.description: Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. [[br]](set upon assertion of WKUP_DOM_RST signal)

bitfield.description: Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. [[br]](set upon assertion of WKUP_DOM_RST signal)

bitfield.description: Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. [[br]](set upon assertion of WKUP_PROC_LRST signal)
